video_title: The Natives and the English - Crash Course US History #3
comment_text: I'm teaching 5th graders (10 year olds) for the first time ever. Is this too heavy and gruesome to show them?? We are learning about the indigenous people of America and I don't want to sugarcoat things, but I also don't want to traumatize anyone. Haha.
